summary: Website for a prestigious/professional music competition where the winner performs at the Jane Elissa Extravaganza (annual Times Square NYC performance with Broadway stars). Site includes an application flow with video submission and a 75 CAD fee, plus FAQs and messaging that proceeds support leukemia and cancer research.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist crest-style logo mark with elegant typography feel (competition-crest-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide cinematic hero banner with abstract stage lights / concert hall ambience, dark luxurious palette (hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
- Subtle repeating background pattern (e.g., faint laurel/notes motif), seamless tile (background-pattern-tile.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a professional, prestigious marketing website for a music competition for the “Jane Elissa Extravaganza” with clear messaging that the winner performs at an annual Times Square New York event with Broadway stars.

Implement a coherent visual theme that feels “super professional and prestigious” (e.g., refined typography, high-contrast palette such as charcoal/ivory with gold accents, generous spacing, formal layout) and apply it consistently across all pages.
Add an FAQs page (or dedicated FAQs section accessible from navigation) containing competition-related frequently asked questions and answers.
Add an “Apply” page with an application form that allows an applicant to either (a) upload a video file or (b) provide a YouTube video link, plus required applicant contact fields.
Collect a 75 CAD application fee as part of the application submission flow using an online payment step, and store the resulting payment status/details with the application record.
Add cause/impact messaging stating that funds raised through application fees go towards leukemia and cancer research.
Generate and include a small set of custom static brand images that reinforce a prestigious competition identity, and use them in the UI as static assets (not served via the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a professional/prestigious marketing website for the music competition (core pages and branding)
Application page/form that allows applicants to submit a video file upload or a YouTube link
Collect a 75 CAD application fee via online payment during application submission
Add cause/impact messaging that application fees fund leukemia and cancer research
Provide a backend query suitable for an internal/admin view to list submitted applications (most recent first), including key fields and payment status.
